00001 #include "CuTest.h"
00002 
00003 #include "FreeImage.h"
00004 #include "FreeImageAlgorithms_IO.h"
00005 #include "FreeImageAlgorithms_Arithmetic.h"

00007 #include "FreeImageAlgorithms_Testing.h"

00009 static void
00010 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_MultiplyTest(CuTest* tc)
00011 {
00012         int x, y, width = 100, height = 100;
00013         FIBITMAP *dib, *dib2;
00014         double *bits;
00015 
00016         dib = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_DOUBLE, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0);
00017 
00018         CuAssertTrue(tc, dib != NULL);
00019 
00020         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00021                 
00022                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib, y);
00023                 
00024                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)        
00025                         bits[x] = 5;
00026         }
00027 
00028         FreeImageAlgorithms_MultiplyGreyLevelImageConstant(dib, 2.0);
00029 
00030         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00031                 
00032                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib, y);
00033                 
00034                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)
00035                         CuAssertTrue(tc, bits[x] == 10.0);
00036         }
00037 
00038         dib2 = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_DOUBLE, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0);
00039 
00040         CuAssertTrue(tc, dib2 != NULL);
00041 
00042         // Test multiplying two images
00043         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00044                 
00045                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib2, y);
00046                 
00047                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)        
00048                         bits[x] = 6;
00049         }
00050 
00051         FreeImageAlgorithms_MultiplyGreyLevelImages(dib, dib2);
00052 
00053         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00054                 
00055                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib, y);
00056                 
00057                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)
00058                         CuAssertTrue(tc, bits[x] == 60.0);
00059         }
00060 
00061         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00062         FreeImage_Unload(dib2);
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 static void
00067 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_DivideTest(CuTest* tc)
00068 {
00069         int x, y, width = 100, height = 100;
00070         FIBITMAP *dib, *dib2;
00071         double *bits;
00072 
00073         dib = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_DOUBLE, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0);
00074 
00075         CuAssertTrue(tc, dib != NULL);
00076 
00077         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00078                 
00079                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib, y);
00080                 
00081                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)        
00082                         bits[x] = 5;
00083         }
00084 
00085         FreeImageAlgorithms_DivideGreyLevelImageConstant(dib, 2.0);
00086 
00087         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00088                 
00089                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib, y);
00090                 
00091                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)
00092                         CuAssertTrue(tc, bits[x] == 2.5);
00093         }
00094 
00095         dib2 = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_DOUBLE, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0);
00096 
00097         CuAssertTrue(tc, dib2 != NULL);
00098 
00099         // Test multiplying two images
00100         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00101                 
00102                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib2, y);
00103                 
00104                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)        
00105                         bits[x] = 10;
00106         }
00107 
00108         FreeImageAlgorithms_DivideGreyLevelImages(dib, dib2);
00109 
00110         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00111                 
00112                 bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dib, y);
00113                 
00114                 for(x=0; x < width; x++)
00115                         CuAssertTrue(tc, bits[x] == 0.25);
00116         }
00117 
00118         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00119         FreeImage_Unload(dib2);
00120 }

00122 CuSuite* DLL_CALLCONV
00123 CuGetFreeImageAlgorithmsArithmaticSuite(void)
00124 {
00125         CuSuite* suite = CuSuiteNew();
00126 
00127         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_MultiplyTest);
00128         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_DivideTest);
00129 
00130         return suite;
00131 }
